text: Karl "Ham" Rove (born December 25, 1950) is an American political consultant and a policy advisor. He was Deputy Chief of Staff under President George W. Bush. Rove is also a Fox News contributor and columnist for the Wall Street Journal.http://www.foxnews.com/on-air/personalities/karl-rove/bio/#s=r-z Rove was born in Denver, Colorado. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Politicians from Denver Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:American political commentators Category:Fox News people
title: Karl Rove
